plot outline: A politician and a corporate broker lock horns. As a result, the politician faces an Income Tax raid. On the same day, a couple of youngsters plan to rob an ATM. As the IT raid and the ATM robbery has some connection, the youngsters get caught. Everyone is searching for a jackpot and what the jackpot is and what happens to it forms the rest of the story.
title: Manja Satta Pacha Satta
plot: A politician and a corporate broker lock horns. As a result, the politician faces an Income Tax raid. On the same day, a couple of youngsters plan to rob an ATM. As the IT raid and the ATM robbery has some connection, the youngsters get caught. Everyone is searching for a jackpot and what the jackpot is and what happens to it forms the rest of the story.
